thread.section_title: Envato Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Envato | www.envato.com
thread.title: Marcia Webster-Loveletterz

author: Marcia Webster-Loveletterz
title: Marcia Webster-Loveletterz
text: They take your money and then want more for add ons. If you want a refund they tell you to cancel your control (Paypal Dispute) and let them control if you get your money back. Don't cancel Paypal keep your control. Nor would i recommend this service. I am stressed out now because they are giving me problem to give me back my money for a service I DID NOT USE FOR ONE MINUTE
